intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: Where do you go to school?
What is your favorite thing about your school?
What is your favorite sport team?

respond_situations.starter_line: Happy birthday! Are you having a party?
respond_situations.description: You meet your friend on their birthday.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. Choose a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to go to the park?
respond_situations.description: You are talking to a friend.
You are in a shop. Ask about the price of a shirt.

ask_situations.instruction: You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.
You are at school. Ask a friend for help with homework.
You want to invite your friends to a birthday party. ..

listening_script.text: I go to school at 8 AM. I have five classes. I eat lunch at 12 PM. I go home at 3 PM. I like my school.

questions.question: What time do you go to school?
How many classes do you have?
What time do you go home?

follow_up_questions.question: When do you eat this snack?
Where do you buy this snack?
Why do you like this snack?
